item.name: Auldstone
item.address1: 296 Booths Road, Taminick via Glenrowan, Vic 3675
item.description: Michael and Nancy Reid have restored a century-old stone winery and have replanted the largely abandoned vineyard around it (shiraz, cabernet sauvignon, merlot, chardonnay, riesling and muscat). All the Auldstone varietal and fortified wines have won medals (usually bronze) in Australian wine shows. Exports to Singapore and China.
